title: Looking for a font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821143713im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/company_4880.jpg)

Any help is much appreciated, thanks.

 [‹ "Account Name Font" etc.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821143713/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35665 "Go to previous forum topic") [CMYK colour chart ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821143713/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33843 "Go to next forum topic")
author: stealyourboognish

comments.content:
Looks like a manually slanted [Monotype Corsiva](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821143713/http:/www.identifont.com/show?1NM), which comes free with the M$ Office-Pack on the Mac.

Btw, you would have got a faster answer at the [Type ID-board](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821143713/http:/typophile.com/forum/29) here at typophile.
